title: 11 Sweater Vests to Take You From Work to the Weekend
description: When it comes to worthwhile investment pieces that can easily elevate even the most muted winter ensemble, few have proven to be more versatile (and timeless!) than a classic sweater vest. The nostalgic style left an evident mark all throughout 1980s and '90s fashion, and with the help of TikTok, it seems to be making yet another comeback this season. There's a reason sweater vests never seem to go out of style, and the answer lies in their flexibility. Whether you want to pair the piece with cargo pants and Doc Martens for a weekend brunch date or simply throw it over a long-sleeved blouse with your favorite jeans and pair of sneakers, there are so many great ways to style a sweater vest. Because we consider the layer to be a true investment piece and wardrobe essential that you'll wear over and over again, we went ahead and shopped out our selections for the 11 best sweater vests so you can achieve the ultimate on- and off-duty looks. Browse our picks below, and find your new favorite layer for fall, winter, and beyond.
author: Kyley Warren
excerpt: Shop the best women's sweater vest styles of the fall and winter season from top retailers such as Nordstrom, Shopbop, Amazon, and Target.
text: Skip to main contentWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.When it comes to worthwhile investment pieces that can easily elevate even the most muted winter ensemble, few have proven to be more versatile (and timeless!) than a classic sweater vest. The nostalgic style left an evident mark all throughout 1980s and '90s fashion, and with the help of TikTok, it seems to be making yet another comeback this season.There's a reason sweater vests never seem to go out of style, and the answer lies in their flexibility. Whether you want to pair the piece with cargo pants and Doc Martens for a weekend brunch date or simply throw it over a long-sleeved blouse with your favorite jeans and pair of sneakers, there are so many great ways to style a sweater vest.Because we consider the layer to be a true investment piece and wardrobe essential that you'll wear over and over again, we went ahead and shopped out our selections for the 11 best sweater vests so you can achieve the ultimate on- and off-duty looks. Browse our picks below, and find your new favorite layer for fall, winter, and beyond. amazon.comBest Colorful Sweater VestLailezou Women's V-Neck Knit Sweater Vest ($15-$28) This sweater vest takes everything you love about cable-knit sweaters and morphs it into a more breathable, sleeveless, and downright vibrant style. The sweater vest is totally effortless, and we'd pair it with flared jeans and sneakers for a casual (and cute!) ensemble that's perfect to wear again and again.shopcider.comBest Red Sweater VestCider Knit V-Neck Cropped Sweater Vest ($26) This red vintage sweater vest is a fail-safe addition to all your cold weather outfits. We love it styled on its own, but you could just as easily layer it on top of a white button-down for a more modest look.shopcider.comBest Patterned Sweater VestCider Oil Painting Graphic Sweater Vest ($26) Something tells us Portia from "The White Lotus" would love squeezing this Cider sweater vest into her hilariously eccentric wardrobe, and we're totally here for it. Adorned with a whimsical landscape painting, this printed sweater vest is sure to turn heads and might even emerge as one of the more unforgettable styles in your winter wardrobe.quince.comBest Open-Stitch Sweater VestQuince Waffle Stitch Sweater Tank ($30) Stick to the basics with this Quince sweater vest. It's finished with a ribbed trim and perfectly cropped to show off a high-waisted jean or embellished belt. Layer it on top of a white button-down shirt, and you've got a new, timeless ensemble to add to your office wardrobe.amazon.comBest Amazon Sweater VestViottiset Oversized V-Neck Knit Sweater Vest ($33) The affordability of this sweater vest from Amazon is really what drew us to the style, but the thousands of shoppers' rave reviews definitely didn't hurt, either. The brown houndstooth pattern is perfect for the prep obsessed, but there are also more than a dozen other colors and prints that the style is available in.target.comBest Cozy Sweater VestTarget Chunky Knit Sweater Vest ($40, originally $50) We're convinced chunky knits are pretty much always a good idea, which is why we're so taken with this Target sweater vest. It's great for a neutral wardrobe, and thanks to its shorter hemline, wearers can easily pair it with another long-sleeved top for a layered look, or simply wear it on its own styled as a sleeveless sweater.nordstrom.comBest Boxy Sweater VestWit & Wisdom Cable Stitch Mock Neck Sweater Vest ($47, originally $78) If the preppy nature of a classic sweater vest isn't your vibe (we totally get it!), consider opting for a sportier iteration like this patterned, boxy version. The style boasts all the same qualities we love about a sleeveless knit, just in a breathable design with wider sleeves. zara.comBest Holiday Party Sweater VestZara Sequin Knit Vest ($50) From the first moment we saw this Zara vest, we knew we'd found a true winner. The lightweight vest features lots of sequins and the ultimate relaxed fit â€” making it a great statement piece to invest in for the fall and winter months.shopbop.comBest Knit Sweater Vest For WomenEnglish Factory Fitted Sweater Vest ($70) It really doesn't get much cuter than this English Factory knit vest. The V-neck sweater vest fits more like a chunky knit, allowing the piece to drape effortlessly over the body without feeling too overbearing.anthropologie.comBest Collared Sweater VestMaeve Collar Stitched Sweater Vest ($98) If you're in the market for something more traditional like a collared sweater vest, we can't recommend this Maeve cable-knit sweater vest from Anthropologie enough. The style has a collared V-neck design that doubles as a great pullover piece. The sleek, dotted pattern is also so divine and adds just the right amount of contrast.anthropologie.comBest Relaxed Gray Sweater VestAnthropologie Sweater Vest ($98) Not all sweater vests are what they seem, and this relaxed Anthropologie sweater vest is proof. The hybrid style blends the look of a relaxed pullover with a classic vest style, resulting in the winter fashion crossover of our dreams.- Additional reporting by Shelcy Joseph and Natasha MarshKyley Warren is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.Shelcy Joseph is a Former Associate Fashion Editor at POPSUGAR, and a self-proclaimed fashion student with a passion for interviewing minority designers and offering informed takes on style and business. She is also the co-founder of NYCXCLOTHES, a successful fashion and lifestyle storytelling platform dedicated to increasing Black and Brown representation in influencer marketing. She has extensive experience in editorial, social media marketing, and commerce writing. In her free time, she loves to hunt down vintage decor pieces and cook new recipes.Natasha Marsh (she/her) is a freelance writer who writes about fashion, beauty, and lifestyle. Prior to freelancing, she held styling staff positions at The Wall Street Journal, Burberry, Cosmopolitan, British GQ, and Harper's Bazaar.
html:
Skip to main content

While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

When it comes to worthwhile investment pieces that can easily elevate even the most muted winter ensemble, few have proven to be more versatile (and timeless!) than a classic sweater vest. The nostalgic style left an evident mark all throughout 1980s and '90s fashion, and with the help of TikTok, it seems to be making yet another comeback this season.

There's a reason sweater vests never seem to go out of style, and the answer lies in their flexibility. Whether you want to pair the piece with cargo pants and Doc Martens for a weekend brunch date or simply throw it over a long-sleeved blouse with your favorite jeans and pair of sneakers, there are so many great ways to style a sweater vest.

Because we consider the layer to be a true investment piece and wardrobe essential that you'll wear over and over again, we went ahead and shopped out our selections for the 11 best sweater vests so you can achieve the ultimate on- and off-duty looks. Browse our picks below, and find your new favorite layer for fall, winter, and beyond.

Best Colorful Sweater Vest

Lailezou Women's V-Neck Knit Sweater Vest ($15-$28)

This sweater vest takes everything you love about cable-knit sweaters and morphs it into a more breathable, sleeveless, and downright vibrant style. The sweater vest is totally effortless, and we'd pair it with flared jeans and sneakers for a casual (and cute!) ensemble that's perfect to wear again and again.

Best Red Sweater Vest

Cider Knit V-Neck Cropped Sweater Vest ($26)

This red vintage sweater vest is a fail-safe addition to all your cold weather outfits. We love it styled on its own, but you could just as easily layer it on top of a white button-down for a more modest look.

Best Patterned Sweater Vest

Cider Oil Painting Graphic Sweater Vest ($26)

Something tells us Portia from "The White Lotus" would love squeezing this Cider sweater vest into her hilariously eccentric wardrobe, and we're totally here for it. Adorned with a whimsical landscape painting, this printed sweater vest is sure to turn heads and might even emerge as one of the more unforgettable styles in your winter wardrobe.

Best Open-Stitch Sweater Vest

Quince Waffle Stitch Sweater Tank ($30)

Stick to the basics with this Quince sweater vest. It's finished with a ribbed trim and perfectly cropped to show off a high-waisted jean or embellished belt. Layer it on top of a white button-down shirt, and you've got a new, timeless ensemble to add to your office wardrobe.

Best Amazon Sweater Vest

Viottiset Oversized V-Neck Knit Sweater Vest ($33)

The affordability of this sweater vest from Amazon is really what drew us to the style, but the thousands of shoppers' rave reviews definitely didn't hurt, either. The brown houndstooth pattern is perfect for the prep obsessed, but there are also more than a dozen other colors and prints that the style is available in.

Best Cozy Sweater Vest

Target Chunky Knit Sweater Vest ($40, originally $50)

We're convinced chunky knits are pretty much always a good idea, which is why we're so taken with this Target sweater vest. It's great for a neutral wardrobe, and thanks to its shorter hemline, wearers can easily pair it with another long-sleeved top for a layered look, or simply wear it on its own styled as a sleeveless sweater.

Best Boxy Sweater Vest

Wit & Wisdom Cable Stitch Mock Neck Sweater Vest ($47, originally $78)

If the preppy nature of a classic sweater vest isn't your vibe (we totally get it!), consider opting for a sportier iteration like this patterned, boxy version. The style boasts all the same qualities we love about a sleeveless knit, just in a breathable design with wider sleeves.

Best Holiday Party Sweater Vest

Zara Sequin Knit Vest ($50)

From the first moment we saw this Zara vest, we knew we'd found a true winner. The lightweight vest features lots of sequins and the ultimate relaxed fit â€” making it a great statement piece to invest in for the fall and winter months.

Best Knit Sweater Vest For Women

English Factory Fitted Sweater Vest ($70)

It really doesn't get much cuter than this English Factory knit vest. The V-neck sweater vest fits more like a chunky knit, allowing the piece to drape effortlessly over the body without feeling too overbearing.

Best Collared Sweater Vest

Maeve Collar Stitched Sweater Vest ($98)

If you're in the market for something more traditional like a collared sweater vest, we can't recommend this Maeve cable-knit sweater vest from Anthropologie enough. The style has a collared V-neck design that doubles as a great pullover piece. The sleek, dotted pattern is also so divine and adds just the right amount of contrast.

Best Relaxed Gray Sweater Vest

Anthropologie Sweater Vest ($98)

Not all sweater vests are what they seem, and this relaxed Anthropologie sweater vest is proof. The hybrid style blends the look of a relaxed pullover with a classic vest style, resulting in the winter fashion crossover of our dreams.

- Additional reporting by Shelcy Joseph and Natasha Marsh

Kyley Warren is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.

Shelcy Joseph is a Former Associate Fashion Editor at POPSUGAR, and a self-proclaimed fashion student with a passion for interviewing minority designers and offering informed takes on style and business. She is also the co-founder of NYCXCLOTHES, a successful fashion and lifestyle storytelling platform dedicated to increasing Black and Brown representation in influencer marketing. She has extensive experience in editorial, social media marketing, and commerce writing. In her free time, she loves to hunt down vintage decor pieces and cook new recipes.

Natasha Marsh (she/her) is a freelance writer who writes about fashion, beauty, and lifestyle. Prior to freelancing, she held styling staff positions at The Wall Street Journal, Burberry, Cosmopolitan, British GQ, and Harper's Bazaar.
